titleStmt.title: The parænese or admonition of Io. Coluille (laitly returnit to the Catholique Romane religion in vhilk he vas baptesit and brocht vp till he had full 14. years of age) vnto his cuntrey men. The contentes of this treatise is to be found after the epistles.
Parænesis Joannis Colvilli. English
titleStmt.author: Colville, John, 1542?-1605.
